summary: The survivors of a plane crash in a remote area are attacked by blob-like alien creatures that turn their victims into blood-thirsty vampires.
cast: Teruo Yoshida|Tomomi Satô|Eizô Kitamura|Hideo Kô|Kathy Horan|Yûko Kusunoki|Kazuo Katô|Hiroyuki Nishimoto|Harold Conway|Nobuo Kaneko|Kei'ichi Noda|Masaya Takahashi|Toshihiko Yamamoto|Michael Kaye|Ted Thomas
keywords: american in japan|mind control|alien invasion|infidelity|frozen corpse
title: Kyuketsuki Gokemidoro
